relation: Adrienne and Elise at Palace Cafe in Greenpoint
When I live tweeted my IUD
When I live tweeted my IUD
Dining On Backs of the Brave

Take a deep breath, and come along as Andrea prepares for her appointment to get an IUD, or intrauterine device. Though many women describe the insertion process as one of the most painful experiences of their lives, the women who love their IUDs can't say enough about how it's led to an entirely new kind of independence from hormones and hassle.

textAfterTable: Listener comments! ♥   Wed. 1/29/14 7:05pm Cheri Pi: My mom is 67, last month she had her japanese IUD taken out after 35 years! we've lived in the states since '80. ♥   Wed. 1/29/14 7:11pm Greg from Bloomfield: I'll take a seat in the back– I'm here to learn. ♥   Wed. 1/29/14 7:17pm
